00033 class Strain_Data {
00034   short int num_elements;
00035   unsigned short int * data;
00036 
00037   public:
00038 
00039   Strain_Data( int N ) : num_elements( N ) {
00040     data = new unsigned short int[ num_elements ];
00041     for ( int n = 0; n < N; ++n ) {
00042       data[ n ] = 0;
00043     }
00044   }
00045 
00046   Strain_Data( const Strain_Data & other ) : num_elements( other.num_elements ) {
00047     data = new unsigned short int[ num_elements ];
00048     for ( int n = 0; n < num_elements; ++n ) {
00049       data[ n ] = other.data[ n ];
00050     }
00051   }
00052 
00053   ~Strain_Data() {
00054     delete[] data;
00055   }
00056 
00057 
00058   int get_num_elements() { return num_elements; }
00059   int size() const { return num_elements; }
00060 
00061   int get_data_element( int i ) {
00062     return data[ i ];
00063   }
00064 
00065   bool operator== ( const Strain_Data & other ) {
00066     if ( num_elements != other.num_elements ) { 
00067       return false;
00068     }
00069     for ( int i = 0; i < num_elements; ++i ) {
00070       if ( data[ i ] != other.data[ i ] ) {
00071         return false;
00072       }
00073     }
00074     return true;
00075   }
00076 
00077   short unsigned int & operator[] ( int i ) { return data[ i ]; }  
00078   const short unsigned int & operator[] ( int i ) const { return data[ i ]; }  
00079 
00080 };
00081

00084   public:

00086     Strain( int num_elements );
00087     Strain( const Strain & other );
00088 
00089     ~Strain();
00090 
00091     void reset();
00092     void setup( int strain, Disease * disease, double trans, Strain * parent );
00093     void print();
00094     void print_alternate( stringstream & out );
00095 
00096     int get_id() { return id; }
00097     double get_transmissibility() { return transmissibility; }
00098 
00099     int get_num_data_elements() { return strain_data.get_num_elements(); };
00100     int get_data_element( int i ) { return strain_data.get_data_element( i ); };
00101 
00102     Strain_Data & get_data() { return strain_data; }
00103     const Strain_Data & get_strain_data() { return strain_data; }
00104 
00105     std::string to_string();
00106 
00107   private:
00108     Strain * parent;
00109     int id;
00110     double transmissibility;
00111     Disease * disease;
00112     Strain_Data strain_data;
00113 
00114   };
